name: xiaomi mi body composition scale 2
description:
Product Features:
• LED display
• Tempered glass
• G-shaped sensor, 50g can be perceived
• Dynamic weighing, static weighing, a dual-use
• Supports switching of three units of jin, kilograms and pounds for easy reading.
• 13 precise data points measurements to fully understand your physical condition
• Low power Bluetooth 5.0, 4 batteries can be used for 12 months.
• Highly accurate BIA chip for easy understanding of body fat percentage.
• Balance test, close your eyes and stand on the Xiaomi 2.0 body fat scale, you can know your ability to balance.
• Syncs your data to Mi Fit App to track your progress and take control of your activities.
• Use the science fitness tutorial of Xiaomi Sports App to customize the training course to help you lose weight and shape your body.

Product Specifications:
• External Dimension: 300 x 300 x 20mm
• Weight: 1.6kg
• Material: ABS
• Units: catties, kilograms, pounds (switchable)
• Battery: 4 AAA batteries
• Requirements for Equipment:
Android 4.4 / iOS 8.0 and above, Bluetooth 4.0

Package Contents:
• Mi Body Composition Scale 2 x1
